nodes.text: The Battle of Antar 4 was a skirmish between the Antarian Rangers and the Confederacy of Independent Systems during the Clone Wars.

Separatist loyalists clashed with the Antarian Rangers who held order on the planet after the Battle of Antar 4 during the Separatist Crisis. Count Dooku bombarded the planet, decimating the Rangers and allowing him to conquer it and set up a new command headquarters there.
